select BBSPK.nextVal as BBS_no from dual

sysdate,
0 )
mapper.select: select b.BBS_no, b.BBS_title, b.BBS_content, b.BBS_date, u.user_nick from BBS b , users u WHERE b.BBS_no = #{bbsNo} and b.user_no = u.user_no
